text: (Wow, it feels like there are sparkling things flying around.)
(Or maybe it's like... surrounded by flowers or something...)

A bear made of bubbles...
um, it's like floating in a coffee bath.

P-Producer-san...
Was that, like, hard to understand...?

True, it looked like it was submerged
up to it's shoulders. I see what you mean.

And even if the expression was a bit hard to understand,
don't worry about it.

Because it's a taste report... we have to convey the flavor,
but everyone also wants to know "how Mano felt".

Especially the visual part, if you can explain it yourself,
it's fine. Let's just convey it honestly.

Even though it feels like a waste to drink it...
I'll have some...

(Serious and polite...
yeah, Mano is doing well as always.)

(She's worrying that she might not be able
to express what she wants to say well, but--)

(If she can build up herconfidence,
I don't think she'll have a problem at all)
It's not bitter, with a gentle sweetness...
You've got bubbles on your face.

Don't apologize, it's fine.
There's no need to rush.

(...It's heartwarming, but
she might not like comments like this--)

Don't be embarrassed, take your time.
Today's just a trial run, it's practice.
